programme.title: O Quadrado
programme.desc: Christian é o respeitado curador de um museu de arte contemporânea. A sua próxima exposição, "O Quadrado", pretende evocar o altruísmo em quem a vê. Mas quando o seu telefone é roubado, irá demonstrar que nem sempre é fácil viver à altura dos nossos ideais...

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: Uma família dos subúrbios, assombrada por espíritos malignos, tem de unir esforços para salvar a filha mais nova, através de quem essas aparições comunicam.

programme.title: A Educadora de Infância
programme.desc: Quando uma educadora de infância de Staten Island descobre que um dos seus alunos de cinco anos talvez seja sobredotado, fica fascinada e obcecada pela criança, entrando numa perigosa e desesperada vertigem para lhe alimentar o talento.

programme.title: Meia-Noite em Paris
programme.desc: Uma família que viaja até Paris em negócios e dois jovens que pretendem casar no outono: todos vão viver experiências que mudarão as suas vidas. É a história do grande amor de um jovem por uma cidade e da ilusão que quase todas as pessoas sentem de que a vida dos outros é sempre melhor do que a sua.

programme.title: Quatro Casamentos e Um Funeral
programme.desc: Charlie é sempre o padrinho, mas nunca o noivo. Ele está determinado a evitar todo o tipo de compromissos, e chega sempre atrasado a todos os casamentos. Mas hoje, para sua surpresa, como se não bastasse já se ter esquecido das alianças... também vislumbrou a rapariga dos seus sonhos!

programme.title: O Quadrado
programme.desc: Christian é o respeitado curador de um museu de arte contemporânea. A sua próxima exposição, "O Quadrado", pretende evocar o altruísmo em quem a vê. Mas quando o seu telefone é roubado, irá demonstrar que nem sempre é fácil viver à altura dos nossos ideais...

programme.title: O Par do Ano
programme.desc: Gwen e Eddie são o casal preferido do país, no ecrã e fora dele. Mas quando o romance bastante público se transforma numa separação privada, apenas o assessor de imprensa Lee e a assistente Kiki podem ajudar! É que Gwen e Eddie têm de fingir o romance enquanto promovem o seu último filme juntos...

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: And Here's Mike With the Weather

programme.title: Rainha de Copas
programme.desc: Anne, uma bem-sucedida advogada, vive com as suas duas filhas e o marido Peter. Mas quando Gustav, o filho problemático de Peter de uma relação anterior, vai viver com eles, Anne cria uma relação íntima com o jovem, pondo em risco a sua vida perfeita.

programme.title: Aberto Até de Madrugada
programme.desc: Dois irmãos, ladrões e assassinos, raptam um pastor religioso e os seus dois filhos adolescentes para conseguirem chegar ao México. Perto da fronteira, param num bar frequentado por "motards" mal-encarados sem desconfiarem que o lugar é, na verdade, um ponto de encontro de vampiros.

programme.title: French Kiss: O Beijo
programme.desc: Kate e Charlie têm a vida perfeita planeada: comprar casa, casar e ter filhos. O medo que Kate tem de voar leva a que fique no Canadá, e Charlie viaja até Paris para uma convenção. Ele apaixona-se por Juliette e põe termo à relação, o que faz com que Kate enfrente os medos e embarque num avião...

programme.title: Amar-te à Meia-Noite
programme.desc: Katie Price, de 17 anos, vive protegida em casa devido a uma doença genética rara, uma sensibilidade à luz solar. No entanto, certa noite ao sair, os seus sonhos tornam-se realidade quando Charlie, por quem tem uma paixoneta, repara nela e a convida para sair.

programme.title: Os Miseráveis
programme.desc: Stéphane, acabado de chegar de Cherbourg, vai integrar a Brigada Anti-Crime nos arredores de Paris. É aí que conhece os seus novos colegas de equipa, Chris e Gwada, e onde descobre as tensões entre os diferentes gangues locais.

programme.title: Rainha de Copas
programme.desc: Anne, uma bem-sucedida advogada, vive com as suas duas filhas e o marido Peter. Mas quando Gustav, o filho problemático de Peter de uma relação anterior, vai viver com eles, Anne cria uma relação íntima com o jovem, pondo em risco a sua vida perfeita.

programme.title: Homens de Coragem
programme.desc: Uma equipa de Forças Especiais da Marinha é enviada numa operação ultrassecreta para resgatar um agente da CIA. A missão leva-os aos locais mais perigosos do globo, onde têm de lidar com o seu compromisso com o país, os companheiros e as respetivas famílias.

programme.title: Jogo da Alta-Roda
programme.desc: Baseado na história verídica de Molly Bloom, uma esquiadora Olímpica que, durante uma década, organizou os jogos de póquer de alto risco mais exclusivos do mundo. Mas tudo mudou quando se tornou um alvo a abater pelo FBI.

programme.title: Castle
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Bad & the Baby

programme.title: Criminal Minds

programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. programme.title: Gladiador
programme.desc: No campo de batalha, o general romano Maximus é o homem de confiança do imperador Marcus Aurelius. Mas o seu reinado acaba quando o seu filho Commodus o mata para subir ao trono. O jovem e instável imperador decide acabar também com a vida de Maximus: vendido como escravo, torna-se gladiador.

programme.title: A Promessa de uma Vida
programme.desc: Uma aventura épica que decorre quatro anos após a devastadora batalha de Galípoli, na Turquia, durante a Primeira Guerra Mundial. Connor, um agricultor australiano, viaja para Istambul para descobrir o destino dos seus filhos, desaparecidos em combate.

programme.title: Morte Limpa
programme.desc: Após seis comissões de serviço, o piloto Tom Egan encontra-se agora num bunker climatizado, no deserto do Nevada, a partir de onde manipula drones e luta contra os talibãs. Desejoso de regressar a um cockpit, questiona os métodos de combate ao terrorismo.

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: Quando Edward Snowden revelou o programa secreto de vigilância da NSA, abriu os olhos do mundo e, consequentemente, fechou as portas do seu futuro. Desistiu da carreira, da namorada e da sua terra natal. O que levou Snowden a perpetrar a maior divulgação de documentos classificados na história?

programme.title: Código de Honra
programme.desc: Quando a sua família é assassinada num tiroteio, o coronel Sikes promete livrar a cidade de todos os criminosos! Começa uma violenta demanda, que o transforma num dos homens mais procurados. Porter, o seu antigo protegido, procura-o, a fim de o levar à justiça e de o travar de uma vez por todas!

programme.title: Mechanic: Assassino Profissional
programme.desc: Quando Arthur Bishop julgava que os seus dias como assassino eram coisa do passado, é forçado a voltar ao ativo quando Gina, o amor da sua vida, é raptada pelo seu inimigo mais perigoso. Mas na mira estão nomes, aparentemente, impossíveis de eliminar.

programme.title: Wild Card - Jogo Duro
programme.desc: Nick Wild é um jogador compulsivo, ex-mercenário, que sobrevive de biscates como segurança e investigador privado. Mas quando uma amiga lhe pede ajuda para encontrar os homens que quase a espancaram até á morte, Nick vê-se envolvido nas teias da Máfia.

programme.title: O Segredo dos Kennedy
programme.desc: A história dos sete dias mais difíceis na carreira do senador Ted Kennedy, que começam numa festa dos colaboradores da campanha de Bobby Kennedy na Ilha de Chappaquiddick. Ted abandona a festa cedo e oferece-se para dar uma fatídica boleia...

programme.title: Pecado
programme.desc: O polícia reformado Eddie Burns enfrenta a vingança sinistra do líder de um grupo de tráfico de heroína.

programme.title: A Floresta
programme.desc: Uma jovem americana, Sara, viaja até à lendária floresta japonesa de Aokigahara, à procura da sua irmã gémea desaparecida. Avisada para "não sair do trilho", Sara está determinada a descobrir a verdade e, para tal, terá de enfrentar os espíritos malévolos.

programme.title: Ainda Sei o Que Fizeste No Verão Passado
programme.desc: Após ter sobrevivido à perseguição de um horrível assassino, uma das adolescentes ainda tem pesadelos terríveis. Para relaxar, resolve ir passar férias a uma estância paradisíaca com um grupo de amigos, mas o assassino está de volta!

programme.title: Gotti - Um Verdadeiro Padrinho Americano
programme.desc: John Gotti enveredou cedo por uma vida de crime e, graças ao seu sangue frio e carisma, conseguiu ganhar estatuto e acabou como cabecilha dos Gambino, a mais poderosa família de mafiosos da América. Mas o seu filho não quer herdar o seu legado.

programme.title: Anacondas: Em Busca da Orquídea Maldita
programme.desc: Uma expedição de cientistas na selva de Bornéu parte em busca de uma rara orquídea, cuja lenda diz ser detentora do elixir da juventude. Mas esta «orquídea de sangue» vai custar a vida a muitos investigadores, pois esconde um feroz predador cuja função é proteger aquela espécie em vias de extinção.

programme.title: Criminosos à Solta
programme.desc: Quatro homens, filhos de mafiosos de Brooklyn, juntam-se para recuperar um saco de dinheiro, que um deles deveria ter levado ao seu pai. Só que este foi apreendido pelo xerife corrupto de uma pequena cidade.

programme.title: Comportamento Perturbado
programme.desc: Steve Clark e a sua família acabam de se mudar para uma nova cidade. O primeiro dia no seu novo liceu é um choque para ele, porque todos os alunos parecem estar vestidos da maneira mais correcta e a sua educação é impecável. Mas Steve torna-se rapidamente amigo de dois colegas rebeldes....

programme.title: O Rei Pescador
programme.desc: Um popular DJ de rádio cai em desgraça após provocar uma tragédia devido à sua arrogância. Quem acaba por lhe dar a mão é um sem-abrigo, que está em busca do Santo Graal e vive num reino de fantasia povoado de castelos, cavaleiros e damas em apuros.

programme.title: Paddington (V.P.)
programme.desc: As divertidas desventuras de um jovem urso peruano, que viaja até Londres à procura de um lar. Perdido na Estação de Comboios de Paddington, ele começa a temer que a vida da cidade não seja como imaginava... até que conhece a família Brown.

programme.title: Mia e o Leão Branco
programme.desc: Mia, de 10 anos, vê a sua vida virada do avesso quando a família decide deixar Londres para gerir uma quinta de criação de leões, na África do Sul. Mas Mia reencontra a felicidade quando nasce um leão branco, Charlie, com quem cria uma ligação próxima.

programme.title: A Ilha das Cabeças Cortadas
programme.desc: Morgan, uma mulher dedicada à pirataria, herdou um barco, uma tripulação de bandidos e a terceira parte de um mapa que está escrito em latim. Para resolver o problema, compra um escravo educado e versado em latim, William Shaw, mas descobre que há mais alguém a seguir a pista do tesouro.

programme.title: Golpe de Amor
programme.desc: Um casal divorciado descobre que o dinheiro do seu plano de reforma foi roubado e concebe um plano para recuperá-lo. Os dois veem-se envolvidos numa perseguição por toda a Europa, num turbilhão de intrigas, perseguições loucas e roubos.

programme.title: O Reino
programme.desc: Quando um terrorista detona uma bomba numa zona residencial norte-americana em Riad, é desencadeado um incidente internacional. Enquanto os diplomatas debatem equações de territorialidade, o agente especial do FBI Ronald Fleury reúne rapidamente uma equipa de elite e negoceia uma viagem secreta.

programme.title: Crime em Nova Iorque
programme.desc: O Detetive Rem Macy investiga uma mão decepada encontrada num lago em Central Park. Durante a investigação, ele apaixona-se pela jovem cuja colega de casa foi assassinada.

programme.title: Olhos Grandes
programme.desc: No final dos anos 1950, o pintor Walter Keane alcançou um sucesso inacreditável com as suas pinturas de crianças com olhos grandes. A chocante verdade acaba, no entanto, por ser descoberta: as obras de Walter eram criadas pela sua mulher, Margaret.

programme.title: Vingança Sem Rosto
programme.desc: Um cientista vê mais do que devia e é vítima disso, ficando com o corpo todo queimado. Entretanto, resolve implantar em si a pele artificial em que trabalhava e que permite modelar qualquer tipo de rosto. Dá então início à sua vingança.

programme.title: Um Avô Muito à Frente
programme.desc: Jason Kelly está a uma semana de casar com a filha do seu super controlador chefe. Mas quando o bem comportado Jason se encarrega de levar o seu avô depravado, Dick, a Daytona para umas férias, as suas núpcias ficam subitamente em perigo.

programme.title: Operação Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A coronel Katherine Powell comanda uma operação, no Quénia, que tem como objetivo capturar terroristas no Quénia. Contudo, vê a sua missão alterada de "captura" para "morte", no momento em que uma menina de nove anos entra na zona de conflito e origina uma disputa internacional.

programme.title: O Castor
programme.desc: Walter Black é um homem cuja depressão tomou conta da sua vida. Sem saber mais o que fazer para o ajudar, e temendo que aquela prostração prejudique o crescimento dos filhos de ambos, Meredith, a sua mulher, opta pelo divórcio. É então que Walter encontra um "castor-fantoche".

programme.title: Decisão Crítica
programme.desc: Quando um grupo terrorista desvia um avião, ameaçando fazê-lo explodir a não ser que o seu líder seja libertado, ficará a cargo do agente David Grant descobrir qual dos passageiros tem o detonador e impedir o massacre.

programme.title: Um Avô Muito à Frente
programme.desc: Jason Kelly está a uma semana de casar com a filha do seu super controlador chefe. Mas quando o bem comportado Jason se encarrega de levar o seu avô depravado, Dick, a Daytona para umas férias, as suas núpcias ficam subitamente em perigo.

programme.title: O Segredo dos Kennedy
programme.desc: A história dos sete dias mais difíceis na carreira do senador Ted Kennedy, que começam numa festa dos colaboradores da campanha de Bobby Kennedy na Ilha de Chappaquiddick. Ted abandona a festa cedo e oferece-se para dar uma fatídica boleia...

programme.title: Os Reis de Miami
programme.desc: Baseado em factos verídicos, conta a história de um proprietário de clubes noturnos de Miami Beach que tem um jovem empregado sob sua proteção, enquanto tenta evitar a bancarrota e a Máfia.

programme.title: Pânico no Túnel
programme.desc: O pânico instala-se quando, num túnel de Nova Iorque, há um desmoronamento na ligação entre Manhattan e Nova Jérsia, na sequência de uma explosão. Entretanto, um homem lidera as pessoas presas no interior e tenta que todos consigam sair em segurança.

programme.title: Kursk
programme.desc: A história verídica do K-141 Kursk, o submarino nuclear russo que se afundou no Mar de Barents em agosto de 2000, e da negligência que se seguiu. Enquanto os 23 marinheiros lutavam pela vida, as suas famílias, desesperadas, tentavam salvá-los a todo o custo.

programme.title: Submarino U-571
programme.desc: Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, a Marinha americana combate um submarino alemão com o intuito de lhes roubar um descodificador secreto.

programme.title: Sexo e Mentiras em Las Vegas
programme.desc: Em Las Vegas, onde ela é uma stripper, Sandy conhece Ted, um milionário e dono de casino. Com ele vive uma bonita história de amor até ao dia em que Ted é encontrado morto por overdose, e ela é acusada de matá-lo.

programme.title: A História de Linda Mccartney
programme.desc: Uma dramatização da vida de Linda McCartney. Os seus primeiros anos a fotografar para a revista Rolling Stone e a socializar com grande parte da elite de Hollywood.

programme.title: Touch The Top Of The World
programme.desc: A história verídica do primeiro homem cego a chegar ao cume do Monte Evereste.

programme.title: Murder, She Baked: Apenas Sobremesas
programme.desc: Hannah Swensen fica felicíssima quando é convidada para o primeiro Concurso de Sobremesas de Eden Lake, mas quando outro membro do júri, o Treinador Boyd Watson, é encontrado assassinado, Hannah propõe-se mais uma vez a descobrir quem é o assassino.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Homicídio, Com Amor
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, é agora psicoterapeuta. Quando uma paciente sua é interrogada sobre as mortes repentinas dos seus pais, o antigo trabalho de Hailey revela-se útil para provar a sua inocência.

programme.title: Winter's Tale - Uma História de Amor
programme.desc: Peter entra na mansão de uma família rica para um assalto, mas, no interior, encontra uma bela jovem por quem se apaixona. No entanto, ela está a morrer e, com o tempo a esgotar-se, nasce entre os dois um amor profundo, que vai além do tempo e do espaço.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Abondance de Biens Ne Nuit Pas

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Ce Qui Ne Tue Pas Rend Plus Fort

programme.title: Magia e Sedução
programme.desc: Sally e Gillian Owens são duas irmãs descendentes de uma família de bruxas que carrega uma maldição centenária. Agora, têm de enfrentar vários feitiços inesperados e ultrapassar todos os obstáculos para encontrarem o verdadeiro amor.

programme.title: A Princesa e o Fuzileiro
programme.desc: Em missão no Bahrein, no Oriente Médio, o soldado Jason Johnson conhece a bela Meriam. Sem saber que ela é membro da família real, ele fica encantado com a princesa. Mas para além das diferenças culturais e religiosas entre eles, a jovem está prometida em casamento, conforme as tradições locais.

programme.title: Mulheres!
programme.desc: Mary é uma mulher moderna, casada com Stephen, um homem de negócios nova-iorquino. Fiel ao marido e mãe de uma filha, está rodeada das suas "amigas". Mas elas sabem uma coisa que ela ignora: O marido anda a traí-la com Crystal Allen.

programme.title: The Client List
programme.sub-title: Save a Horse, Ride a Cowboy

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Abondance de Biens Ne Nuit Pas

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Homicídio, Com Amor
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, é agora psicoterapeuta. Quando uma paciente sua é interrogada sobre as mortes repentinas dos seus pais, o antigo trabalho de Hailey revela-se útil para provar a sua inocência.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Herança Fatal
programme.desc: Hailey, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, utiliza as suas competências e os seus contactos quando a sua amiga Pam desaparece enquanto tratava de vender a grande propriedade dos pais, já falecidos.

programme.title: Elizabeth
programme.desc: Sob o reinado da rainha católica Mary I, o país ficou arruinado e devassado pelas lutas religiosas, na sua tentativa de impor o catolicismo. Contra a sua vontade, sucede-lhe por morte a sua meia-irmã Elizabeth Tudor, filha de Henrique VIII, que Mary I tentara condenar por traição.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Tout Vient À Point À Qui Sait Attendre

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Fais Ce Que Dois, Advienne Que Pourra

programme.title: A Idade de Adaline
programme.desc: Depois de, miraculosamente, ter ficado com 29 anos durante quase oito décadas, Adaline Bowman leva uma vida solitária. No entanto, um encontro casual com um jovem e carismático filantropo reacende a sua paixão pela vida e pelo amor.

programme.title: Ligações Selvagens III
programme.desc: Ao cumprir 18 anos, Marie Clifford herdará a fortuna da mãe, incluindo um par de diamantes. Mas quando o seu padrasto é acusado de violar Elena, a ovelha negra da vizinhança, Marie tem de decidir se empenha os seus diamantes para o ajudar pondo em marcha uma história de enganos, traições e crime.

programme.title: A Noite da Vingança
programme.desc: Um advogado sul-americano recebe um dia a boleia de um estranho sedutor e convida-o a visitar a sua casa. Só que a mulher, quando o ouve, fica com a certeza que ele era um alto oficial do antigo regime, que então a torturou e violou, e prende-o para forçá-lo a confessar.

programme.title: T-34
programme.desc: Em 1944, o comandante russo Nikolai Ivushkin, que está há três anos prisioneiro dos nazis, lidera um grupo corajoso de soldados e prepara uma audaciosa fuga ao cativeiro alemão num tanque T-34 meio destruído.

programme.title: Dia de Fúria
programme.desc: Na Espanha do século XVI, o agente da lei Ruy de Mendoza investiga uma série de crimes bizarros e misteriosos, mas quando vê que se levantam muitos obstáculos ao seu trabalho, percebe que há uma teia maior de interesses por trás de tudo.

programme.title: Os Gloriosos 39
programme.desc: Às vésperas da Segunda Guerra Mundial, a filha adotiva de um destacado político britânico vai descobrir um segredo que envolve os dois lados do conflito.

programme.title: Iris
programme.desc: A vida da brilhante escritora inglesa Iris Murdoch e a sua 'imersão' na doença de Alzheimer. A sua história desde que se casou com o inteletual John Bayley até à sua morte.

programme.title: 1941 - Ano Louco em Hollywood
programme.desc: Cenas de histeria coletiva invadem a costa da Califórnia nos dias que se seguem ao ataque japonês a Pearl Harbor. Um submarino nipónico invade as águas territoriais americanas com um único fim em vista: bombardear Hollywood.

programme.title: Meu Bebé
programme.desc: Héloise é mãe de três filhos. Jade, a mais nova, fez 18 anos e vai continuar os estudos no Canadá. Héloise sente então que está prestes a esgotar-se a principal razão da sua existência, ser mãe, e começa a gravar com o seu telemóvel todos os momentos passados com a filha.

programme.title: Linda de Morrer
programme.desc: Na pequena cidade americana de Mount Rose, o muito aguardado concurso anual de beleza começa a gerar as maiores suspeitas quando várias concorrentes vão morrendo de forma misteriosa e se torna claro que há alguém a querer vencer a qualquer custo.

programme.title: Icarus, Máquina de Guerra
programme.desc: Edward Genn, nome de código Icarus, é um assassino treinado do KGB que trabalhou durante anos como um agente adormecido da América. No entanto, quando o Império Soviético ruiu, viu-se isolado num país estrangeiro e sem ninguém em quem confiar.

programme.title: Black Mask: A Cidade das Máscaras
programme.desc: Enquanto tenta encontrar uma cura para os seus poderes, o Máscara Negra vai fazer tudo para impedir a explosão de uma bomba de ADN que pode provocar mutações em toda a espécie humana.

programme.title: Cavalgada para a Morte
programme.desc: Billy The Kid e o seu gangue são procurados pelos homens da lei. Quando Doc e Chavez são capturados, Billy tem de levar a cabo uma fuga ousada, enviando todos os três para o México para se esconderem. Mas não é fácil para os homens do Oeste alcançarem essa proeza.

programme.title: Jerónimo - Uma Lenda Americana
programme.desc: A história do chefe Apache Geronimo e a sua luta contra o exército dos Estados Unidos para evitar a subjugação do seu povo.

programme.title: Perigo Íntimo
programme.desc: Tom O'Meara, um polícia nova-iorquino, acolhe em sua casa Rory Devaney, um jovem irlandês recentemente chegado aos Estados Unidos. Entre ambos cresce uma grande amizade, até ao dia em que Tom descobre que Rory é algo mais que um amigo... é um dos mais temíveis e procurados assassinos do IRA.

Big Al fez inúmeros inimigos ao longo da vida, mas nenhum mais perigoso do que a sua grande paixão, Kat. Os dois vivem do crime, do tráfico de armas e de assaltos, mas Kat quer mais e começa a vender armas, entrando num mundo novo e do qual Big Al não faz parte.

programme.title: O Guarda de Auschwitz
programme.desc: Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, Hans, um ex-aluno brilhante, torna-se oficial das SS e é colocado no campo de concentração de Auschwitz-Birkenau, onde recebe a ordem de construir uma câmara de gás eficiente. Como lidará ele com os horrores dos seus atos durante e depois do conflito?

programme.title: Zona de Quarentena
programme.desc: Após a libertação de um vírus letal que transforma os humanos em zombies, um esquadrão de soldados das forças especiais tem de se infiltrar numa zona em quarentena para resgatar um cientista que pode representar a única esperança de salvação da humanidade.

programme.title: Ajudem as Miúdas
programme.desc: Lisa Conroy, a gerente de um "sports bar" de beira de estrada, vê testado até ao limite o seu incurável otimismo e a fé nas suas funcionárias, nos seus clientes e em si própria, ao longo de um estranho dia.

programme.title: Assalto Inesperado
programme.desc: Quando um ladrão invade uma casa para um assalto, dá de caras com uma rapariga a meio de uma tentativa de suicídio. O que começa por ser uma aventura, rapidamente se transforma numa comédia romântica sobre duas pessoas que acabam por salvar-se uma à outra.

programme.title: Milagre de Lourdes
programme.desc: O drama religioso, dedicado às aparições de Nossa Senhora na vida de Santa Bernadette, apresenta uma Bernadette com 14 anos a lutar para ser ouvida e que sofreu pela sua determinação.

programme.title: O Pequeno Stuart Little (V.O.)
programme.desc: O pequeno George, filho único, adorava ter um irmão para brincar. Quando os pais resolvem adotar uma "criança" encontram Stuart, um querido e divertido ratinho, que lhes derrete o coração... a partir desse momento a vida da família Little vai mudar para sempre.

programme.title: O Pequeno Stuart Little 2 (V.O.)
programme.desc: À medida que o filho dos Little cresce e faz novas amizades, Stuart percebe que também tem de arranjar novos amigos. Conhece então Margalo, que é raptada pelo malvado Falcão. Stuart entra em ação e, com a ajuda do gato Snowbell, embarca numa arrojada aventura. Será que ainda vão a tempo de a salvar?

programme.title: Comportem-se Como Adultos
programme.desc: Grécia 2015: a economia está no caos e o país à beira da bancarrota. Um novo governo revolta-se contra as regras restritivas da União Europeia e inspira milhões de europeus. O Ministro das Finanças grego, Yanis Varoufakis, vai ser o protagonista desse combate.

programme.title: Uma Aventura Nos Mares - A 1ª Viagem de Circum-Navegação (V.P.)
programme.desc: Uma viagem que se inicia no mesmo local onde irá terminar e a partir da qual nada será igual. Esta é a crónica dos navegadores que se colocaram ao leme da História e mudaram o rumo da Humanidade.

programme.title: O Falcão Ataca de Novo
programme.desc: Eddie Hawkins, mais conhecido como o "grande falcão", é um ladrão de luva branca que acaba de cumprir uma pena de prisão e que agora planeia viver como um homem honrado. No entanto, vê-se ameaçado pelo louco Mayflower, que o chantageia: ou rouba uma invenção de Da Vinci ou o seu amigo Tommy morre.

programme.title: Má Vizinhança 2
programme.desc: Mac e Kelly Radner esperam o segundo filho e estão prontos para a derradeira mudança: os subúrbios. Mas quando descobrem que os novos vizinhos são uma irmandade ainda mais descontrolada do que a de Teddy, terão de unir forças com o ex-inimigo.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Longfellow Deeds, um rapaz da província, chega à cidade de Manhattan para receber uma herança de 40 biliões de dólares que lhe deixou um tio afastado. A vida do milionário "simples" corre bem e, com a ajuda do seu mordomo, Deeds anda divertido a descobrir um mundo novo.

programme.title: A Última Noitada
programme.desc: Ethan, Isaac e Chris passam juntos a noite de Natal há 10 anos. Uma noite de deboche, para quebrar todas as regras. Mas chegou a última noite desta tradição e, quando ela terminar, estes três grandes amigos ganharão finalmente algum juízo. Ou não...

programme.title: Bordertown - Cidade Sob Ameaça
programme.desc: Uma jornalista do "Chicago Sentinel", filha de imigrantes mexicanos, investiga uma série de crimes de mulheres perto de fábricas americanas na fronteira de Juarez e El Paso.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Created by Frank Darabont. With Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Lauren Cohan, Josh McDermitt. programme.sub-title: Ukuli'i ka Pua, Onaona i Ka Mau'u (Tiny is the Flower, Yet it Scents the Grasses Around It)

programme.title: Hawai: Força Especial
programme.sub-title: He 'oi'o Kuhihewa; He Kaka ola i 'ike 'ia e ka Makaula (Don't Blame Ghosts and Spirits for One's Troubles; A Human is Responsible)

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324","dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Created by Frank Darabont. With Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Lauren Cohan, Josh McDermitt. Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1520211/","name":"The Walking Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmU5NTcwNjktODIwMi00ZmZkLTk4ZWUtYzVjZWQ5ZTZjN2RlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1520211/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"multiplayerxgesource"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Compelling but it's time for this to DIE","reviewBody":"The zombie genre has been dragged into an endless time loop of reboots, reimagined visions, and bland DRIVEL. Like fortnite....zombies have become more of a TOOL than actual intriguing storytelling anymore. Come up with something original pick another LORE to explore. Zombie entertainment has become much like woke and cancel culture..... OLD AND BORING. Grow up and get a life and try to enjoy entertainment that is deeper than being DEAD."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":895995,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-10-31","keywords":"zombie,survival,post apocalypse,based on comic,zombie apocalypse","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511088/","name":"Andrew Lincoln"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005342/","name":"Norman Reedus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564350/","name":"Melissa McBride"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090153/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092570/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001104/","name":"Frank Darabont"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 11 Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3631857689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGE4YWVjZjEtNWIwMC00YWM3LWIxMTUtOTMyMDAyYzQwMzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGE4YWVjZjEtNWIwMC00YWM3LWIxMTUtOTMyMDAyYzQwMzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Walking Dead returns August 22 on AMC. programme.title: Velocidade Furiosa - Ligação Tóquio
programme.desc: Quando Sean Boswell, um rapaz condenado por participar em corridas ilegais, tenta começar uma nova vida no outro lado do mundo, a sua obsessão pelas corridas coloca-o em rota de colisão com o submundo japonês. Para sobreviver, terá de participar numa corrida "drift", um novo estilo de corridas.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E.
